sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Updates core employee record.

Inputs:

  • ID - Unique integer employee ID.
  • User ID - Employee ID can be used as user's reference.
  • User Name - User name of the employee.
  • GUID - System generated unique identifier for user.
  • First Name - First name of the employee.
  • Last Name - Last name of the employee.
  • Middle Name - Middle name of the employee.
  • Prefix - Name prefix of the employee.
  • Suffix - Name Suffix of the employee.
  • Primary Email - Primary email ID of the employee.
  • Personal Email - Personal email ID of the employee.
  • Home Phone - Home phone of the employee.
  • Mobile Phone - Mobile phone of the employee.
  • Work Phone - Work phone of the employee.
  • Fax - Fax of the employee.
  • Address - Address details.
    • Country (For e.g. IND, CAN)
    • Line1
    • Line2
    • City
    • State
    • Zip Code
  • Worker Status - Worker status details.
    • Last Hire Date
    • Original Hire Date
    • Active
    • Absent
  • Settings - User setting details.
    • Display Language (For e.g. English (US))
    • Time Zone (For e.g. (UTC+05:00) Islamabad, Karachi)
    • Training Approvals
  • Manager - User manager details.
    • ID
    • User ID
    • First Name
    • Last Name
  • Approver - User approver details.
    • ID
    • User ID
    • First Name
    • Last Name
  • Relations - User custom relations.
    • Relation Type
    • ID
    • User ID
    • First Name
    • Last Name
  • OUs - User organisation unit details.
    • ID
    • OU ID
    • Name
    • Type
  • Self-Registration Group - Self registration details.
    • ID
    • OU ID
    • Name
    • Type
  • Custom OUs - Custom organisation unit details. This is required if "Required on User Record" is checked under "Manage Organizational Unit Types".
    • ID
    • OU ID
    • Name
    • Type
  • Custom Fields - User custom field details in JSON format.
  • Employee Meta Data - User metadata information.
    • Created Date
    • Modified Date
  • Reason For Change - Reason for change.

Outputs:

  • ID - Employee ID.
  • URL - URL for employee details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Cornerstone, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message -Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Provided ID is invalid.
  • Provided User ID is invalid or already in use.
  • Provided User Name is invalid or already in use.
  • Provided Reason For Change is invalid.
  • Provided First Name is invalid.
  • Provided Last Name is invalid.
  • Provided Middle Name is invalid.
  • Provided Prefix is invalid.
  • Provided Suffix is invalid.
  • Provided Primary Email is invalid.
  • Provided Personal Email is invalid.
  • Provided Home Phone is invalid.
  • Provided Mobile Phone is invalid.
  • Provided Work Phone is invalid.
  • Provided Fax is invalid.
  • Provided Country is invalid.
  • Provided Line 1 is invalid.
  • Provided Line 2 is invalid.
  • Provided City is invalid.
  • Provided State is invalid.
  • Provided Zip Code is invalid.
  • Provided Last Hire Date under Worker Status is invalid.
  • Provided Original Hire Date under Worker Status is invalid.
  • Provided Display Language Field is invalid.
  • Provided Time Zone Field is invalid.
  • Provided Training Approvals Field is invalid.
  • Provided Manager ID is invalid.
  • Provided Manager Field is invalid.
  • Provided Approver Detail is invalid.
  • Provided Approver ID is invalid.
  • Provided Relation Type is invalid.
  • Provided ID under Relations is invalid.
  • Provided Self Registration Group Detail is invalid.
  • Provided OUs field or Custom OUs field is either invalid or missing.
  • Provided Custom OUs ID is invalid.
  • Provided Custom Field is invalid.
  • Invalid username, password, or token, or expired token.
  • User doesn’t have sufficient permission to perform this action.
  • Unexpected error occurred. Check the response received from the API for more details.

To use this action, the corresponding Cornerstone connection and credential must be created and associated with the Cornerstone Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

Updates core employee record.

Inputs:

  • ID - Unique integer employee ID.
  • User ID - Employee ID can be used as user's reference.
  • User Name - User name of the employee.
  • GUID - System generated unique identifier for user.
  • First Name - First name of the employee.
  • Last Name - Last name of the employee.
  • Middle Name - Middle name of the employee.
  • Prefix - Name prefix of the employee.
  • Suffix - Name Suffix of the employee.
  • Primary Email - Primary email ID of the employee.
  • Personal Email - Personal email ID of the employee.
  • Home Phone - Home phone of the employee.
  • Mobile Phone - Mobile phone of the employee.
  • Work Phone - Work phone of the employee.
  • Fax - Fax of the employee.
  • Address - Address details.
    • Country (For e.g. IND, CAN)
    • Line1
    • Line2
    • City
    • State
    • Zip Code
  • Worker Status - Worker status details.
    • Last Hire Date
    • Original Hire Date
    • Active
    • Absent
  • Settings - User setting details.
    • Display Language (For e.g. English (US))
    • Time Zone (For e.g. (UTC+05:00) Islamabad, Karachi)
    • Training Approvals
  • Manager - User manager details.
    • ID
    • User ID
    • First Name
    • Last Name
  • Approver - User approver details.
    • ID
    • User ID
    • First Name
    • Last Name

    • OU ID
    • Name

  • Custom OUs - Custom organisation unit details. This is required if "Required on User Record" is checked under "Manage Organizational Unit Types".
    • ID
    • OU ID
    • Name
    • Type
  • Custom Fields - User custom field details in JSON format.
  • Employee Meta Data - User metadata information.
    • Created Date
    • Modified Date
  • Reason For Change - Reason for change.

Outputs:

  • ID - Employee ID.
  • URL - URL for employee details.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Cornerstone, Status is set to “Error".
  • Error Message -Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • Provided ID is invalid.
  • Provided User ID is invalid or already in use.
  • Provided User Name is invalid or already in use.
  • Provided Reason For Change is invalid.
  • Provided First Name is invalid.

To use this action, the corresponding Cornerstone connection and credential must be created and associated with the Cornerstone Connection & Credential alias. Learn More
